channel.title: [PI] How to change black sky to white, CLICK ME FOR PROOF
channel.description:
[B]I've got Project Insanity..
My Fog/Sky is black, how can i change it to White. look this is mine now:[/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0QEWsWR.png[/img]
[B]Need it like this:[/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NPcTd14.png[/img]
Please if you know how to, please explain as much as you know, for which class and what should i find etc..
Thanks.

item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Rye:

I’m not going to find anything, just need help for you, what i should search and replace and what should i add and etc… if you don’t know how to, don’t reply.

Please stop being so rude! Every reply to this topic has been helpful in some sort of way, and I’m pretty sure they “know how to” do this if they already stated what you have to do to change it.

Find this file in your Client:

Open that file up and search for:

That should be enough help to get you started.

item.title: [PI] How to change black sky to white, CLICK ME FOR PROOF
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:5, topic:518694”]Confirmed type this exactly into your zfilesearch

What do you mean explain…? Go to that method… go to the HEX code. All a hex code is a color. In your case you are looking for a blackish hex color. Change that to a foggish type of grey/beige.

http://www.color-hex.com/
